imdb.plot outline: Mysteries, Myths and Murders is a television show like no other. The show being produced by ThunderBall, will see British investigators and researchers, from all walks of life, investigate and research British Mysteries, Myths and Murders, from infamous true crime cases, to mysterious disappearances, strange creatures, and ghostly phenomena.
imdb.title: Mysteries, Myths and Murders
plot: _Mysteries, Myths and Murders_ (qv) is a television show like no other. The show being produced by ThunderBall, will see British investigators and researchers, from all walks of life, investigate and research British _Mysteries, Myths and Murders_ (qv), from infamous true crime cases, to mysterious disappearances, strange creatures, and ghostly phenomena.::Mike Covell
